log: Additional options for auto-formation: Night, Boss, High Armor/EVA enemies, Offtank position
Add Unreleased Dolls: Tac-50, MP-443, PP-19-01, Mosin Nagant mod, T77, Gsh-18, Clear and Fail
Logistics: Checkboxes will default to available content
Unreleased dolls now have a red indicator on the pick button
Translations, fixed image display for unreleased dolls
